resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/107487</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>107487</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765085911</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Transit of Venus</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Durchfahrt von Venus</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Passage de Venus</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Trânsito de Venus</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Transito di Venus</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διέλευση της Αφροδίτης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Tránsito de Venus</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">On June 8, 2004, a transit of Venus will occur, the first in 122 years. This article explains what a transit is, why it matters, and when and how you can safely view it.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">An Juni 8, 2004, tritt eine Durchfahrt von Venus, 
das erste in 122 Jahren auf. Dieser Artikel beschreibt, was eine
Durchfahrt ist, warum sie ausmacht und wenn und wie Sie ihn sicher 
ansehen können.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">8 juin 2004, un passage de Venus se produira, le 
premier en 122 ans. Cet article explique ce qu'est un passage, 
pourquoi il importe, et quand et comment vous pouvez sans risque le 
visualiser.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Junho em 8, 2004, um trânsito de Venus ocorrerá,
o primeiro em 122 anos. Este artigo explica o que um trânsito 
é, porque importa, e quando e como você pode com segurança o ver.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il 8 giugno 2004, un transito di Venus si 
presenterà, il primo durante 122 anni. Questo articolo spiega 
che cosa un transito è, perchè importa e quando e come potete 
osservarli sicuro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Στις 8 Ιουνίου ..2004, μια διέλευση της Αφροδίτης θα
εμφανιστεί, η πρώτη σε 122 έτη. Αυτό το άρθρο εξηγεί τι
μια διέλευση είναι, γιατί πειράζει, και πότε και πώς μπορείτε 
ακίνδυνα να την εμφανίσετε.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">8 de junio de 2004, un tránsito de Venus 
ocurrirá, el primer en 122 años. Este artículo explica 
cuáles es un tránsito, porqué importa, y cuando y cómo usted puede
visión con seguridad lo.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>

            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD

          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>

          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>

            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>

          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>107487</entry>

      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>

    <item>
